alert.note: Alert for Burt; Thurston (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 9:27PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Burt and southeastern Thurston Counties through 945 PM CDT... At 927 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles southeast of Rosalie to 2 miles northwest of Craig. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Decatur around 940 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for west central Iowa...and northeastern and east central Nebraska.
